Posts.Content: Apr 4, 2007 12:01PM DebNC wrote: Hi! I had it done and didn't think it was too bad at all. Usually , my pain tolerance is not too good. But with this procedure, I tolerated it well. Good luck to you, and I hope all turns out well!-Deb
Posts.Title: Wire guided excisional biopsy katiejaye leaf

Posts.Content: Feb 6, 2008 06:40AM DebNC wrote: I had the same diagnosis and chose the mastectomy.  It was an easy choice for me, since my Mom had breast cancer and ultimately passed away due to it.  Also, if you have "grade 3", it could ultimately  turn into an invasive cancer.  (Or so I've been told!)  Good luck with your decision! Take care-Deb P.S. I have since completed reconstruction and all has turned out quite well. If you have any questions, please feel free to message me! : )
Posts.Title: Multifocal DCIS Mastectomy or no? ShayRN HelenaJ
